SysFileRead (FUN)
SysFileRead (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileRead : __XWORD
Read number of bytes out of the file
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileRead
__XWORD
Number of bytes read from file. 0=if failed
Input
hFile
RTS_IEC_HANDLE
Handle of the file
pbyBuffer
POINTER TO BYTE
Pointer to buffer for read data
ulSize
__XWORD
Number of bytes to read from file. Must be less or equal the
buffer size!
pResult
POINTER TO RTS_IEC_RESULT
Pointer to runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)
